original_text: Because ye have taken my silver and my gold, and have carried into your temples my goodly pleasant things:
korean_text: 곧 너희가 내 은과 금을 빼앗고 나의 진기한 보물을 너희 신전으로 가져갔으며

sentences.original_text: Because ye have taken my silver and my gold
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내 은과 금을 가져갔기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and have carried into your temples
